name: volcengine-tos
description: A sample MCP server for VolcEngine TOS that flexibly get objects from TOS.

prompts.name: List Buckets
prompts.description: Returns a list of all buckets owned by the authenticated sender of the request

prompts.name: List Objects in a Bucket
prompts.description: Returns some or all (up to 1,000) of the objects in a bucket with each request

prompts.name: Get an Object
prompts.description: Retrieves an object from volcengine TOS.
